    DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(curl -sSL https://terraria.gamepedia.com/Server#Downloads | grep '>Terraria Server ' | grep -Eoi '<a [^>]+>' | grep -Eo 'href=\"[^\\\"]+\"' | grep -Eo '(http|https):\/\/[^\"]+' | tail -1 | cut -d'?' -f1)

    fi
fi

echo ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}

unzip ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}

rm -rf System*
rm -rf Mono*
rm -rf monoconfig
rm -rf mscorlib.dll
